front.title: Information model for G.709 Optical Transport Networks (OTN)

abstract.t: The recent revision of ITU-T recommendation G.709 [G.709-v3] hasintroduced new fixed and flexible ODU containers in Optical TransportNetworks (OTNs), enabling optimized support for an increasinglyabundant service mix.This document provides a model of information needed by the routingand signaling process in OTNs to support Generalized MultiprotocolLabel Switching (GMPLS) control of all currently defined ODUcontainers.
